A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Sub-par plot with too many storylines and Disney touches to be called a real Star Wars movie. Some of the action scenes are very well done with a lot of vivid pictures but they alone can’t hold up an entire 2.5 hour movie. Didn’t like Rose’s character and her and Finns storyline was completely useless. There are a ton of other things I hate about this movie but you’ll have to watch it to agree. Overall this is a redbox movie\, not one I would spend theater money on. This is one of the worst Star Wars movies in the franchise.
